channel.title: (solved)No internet on Gateway
channel.description:
Hello there,
After a new installation of the Linux host "Mint19.3.Cinnamon" Whonix no longer has an internet connection.
I get the following message in the gateway:
"Error:check network interfaces Result: network interface eth1 not up! If you know what you are doing,feel free to disable this check.Create a file /etc/whonix.d/50:whonixcheck_user.conf and add:
Whonixcheck_skip_function+=" check_network_interfaces "
Debugging information: Command cat /sys/class/net/eth1/carrier failed."
I tried:"cat /sys/class/net/eth1/carrier"
with the result:"No such file or directory.
The file "carrier" does exist,but is empty.
I am using VirtualBox 5.2.34.
I need this Version because of a Windows-Guest.
Please,use simple words.
Thanks in advanced

item.title: (solved)No internet on Gateway
item.dc:creator: Odin99
item.description:
By using VirtualBox 6.0.14 I was able to solve the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: (solved)No internet on Gateway
item.dc:creator: Odin99
item.description:
In past this Version of VirtualBox worked fine with this Version of Mint.

Read full topic

item.title: (solved)No internet on Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
Old VirtualBox versions are unsupported.

whonix.org – 1 Dec 17

Unsupported - Whonix

What do you mean by unsupported?

Read full topic
